title: tirumalaiyuDaiyAnai
sahitya:
tirumalaiyuDaiyAnai tirumagaL aDaiyAnbai tiruppArk-kaDalAnai ninai manamE


anupallavi

  karumukhil nirattAnai kuzhal Osai taruvAnai perumalai siruvAnai mUvulagaLandAnai


caraNam    OlamiDa Or yAnai tuyar tira vandAnai bAlan dhruvanukku padam tanai tandAnai
kAlam kaDandAnai kAkkum karattAnai jnAlam niraindAnai jnAnamAnavanai
